Dear Brand:
Hi, if you are looking for "English" sources,
Turnbull's book may be the only "comprehensive" source
worthwhile to look at. or you can get segments of
information on the campaign from different sources.(I
guess people here can help you a lot for this case.)
If you can read either Japanese or Chinese, then you
can have more variety of access.

ps. Please, do not misinterprete my message as
supportive of Mr. Turnbull's position. As a person in
academy also, I found most of arguments posed by
people here on Mr. Turnbull's work legitimate.




                               Sincerely,




                               Changsub Lee
